name: Glitch 404
description: An eerie Glitch Effect for the 404 page
author: Vittorio Ramponi - www.mywebpassion.it

messageInOptions.text: This plugin replaces the body of the 404 page with a full-screen glitch effect.

config.name: separator
config.note: Visit Github repository plugin page for more information and theme settings.

config.name: overlayColor
config.label: Overlay color
config.note: Overlay color applied to the image. It is recommended to set high transparency.

config.name: titleText
config.label: Title
config.note: Enter the H1 title of the 404 page.

config.name: descriptionText
config.label: Description
config.value: The page you were looking for appears to have been moved, deleted or does not exist. You could go back to where you were or head straight to our home page.

config.name: linkText
config.label: Link label
config.note: Label for the homepage link. Leave blank if you donâ€™t want to include a link to the homepage.

config.name: animation
config.label: Glitch text
config.note: Apply the glitch effect to the text. If disabled, the text will remain static on the page.

config.name: separator
config.note: In this section, you can modify some advanced parameters. The result may be unpredictable :)

config.name: glitchHeight
config.label: Image height
config.note:
The image height should be adjusted based on the theme's characteristics and applied styles. Default is 90vh.
Below are some examples; theme variables are supported:
100vh | 800px | 100vh - var(--navbar-height) | 100vh - var(--header-height)

config.name: personalCSS
config.label: Custom CSS
config.note:
The page doesn't look as expected? You can enter your CSS here. This code will only affect the 404 page.
Some themes may require specific rules:
Mono: .main {grid-area: main;}
